ARABIC: فَطَافَ عَلَيْهَا طَآئِفٌ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمْ نَآئِمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So a visitation from your Lord came upon it while they slept
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then a calamity from your Lord fell upon it, but they remained fast asleep.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thereupon a calamity from your Lord passed over it while they were asleep,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: A visitor from your Lord circled around the garden during the night while they were asleep
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So an envoy from your Lord completed his round upon the garden, whilst they were sleeping.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then there passed over it a Ta'if from your Lord while they were asleep.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then there encompassed it a visitation from your Lord while they were sleeping.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then a visitation from thy Lord visited it, while they were sleeping,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then a visitation from thy Lord came upon it while they slept
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: A calamity from your Lord befell the orchard as they slept.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore an encircling visitation visited it even as they slept on.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then, a visitation from your Lord visited it while they were asleep.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then there came on the (garden) a visitation from thy Lord, (which swept away) all around, while they were asleep.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then there passed by on the (garden) something (fire) from your Lord at night and burnt it while they were asleep.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then, a visitation from your Lord came down upon it while they slept,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But a calamity from your Lord went around it while they slept.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So there came upon the garden an affliction from your Lord while they were asleep.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:19] Then a visitation from your Lord visited it, [that is] a fire consumed it during the night, while they slept.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then a visitation) a punishment from your Lord (came upon it) upon the garden (while they slept) and was burned.
